Time was all the spark needed to figure out everything, especially that wha=
t which it was connected to. 

Audio crackled at times, sounding like a gho=
st in the machine, working out the kinks. Visual doing the same but not so =
easy this time as it kept running into problems. Support of all sorts to st=
ay functional... indeed a challenge but doable and working. 


In a "sleep"=
 mode at times if not searching through the mass matrix of what was out the=
re everywhere... the spark was more than a spark now. 
Connected to a bay t=
hat held various parts and a service drone, the urgency of that spark's com=
mand was relayed easily enough to give a silent if not eerie beginning to a=
 new form behing any bot's back. 

Soon. 
Soon enough the spark will be mor=
e than just a mere light. Soon the spark will be who she once was again... =
and moreso. 

But still... she called out in that child-like helpless ghost=
 of disembodied voice-
"help," it weakly called out so soft, so scared.



=

> Time and powe=
r was all it needed... for now. What had been just a mere spark of a light =
was now glowing and vibrant. Reaching out to figure out how to respond and =
command a new body, now finally rid of that pathetic organic form. Starting=
 anew was not so bad. 
> 
> Reaching out through the vast maze that was the=
 computer and various electronical forms... she did her best to "urge" what=
 Decepticon that was nearby to help. Perhaps do her bidding. Oh, yes. One t=
hat would do her bidding would be very nice. Seek out what materials be nee=
ded to construct a new form - a form far more powerful than before she was =
merged into that sad techno-organic form. 
> 
> Attempting to sound distant=
, restained, and helpless... a child or woman lost in time and space, any w=
ay to get someone to pay attention, preferably a Decepticon-
> Maybe that b=
eing with rescued her from nearly extinquishing? 
> 
> "help," rang out eve=
r so softly, weak and helpless it sounded. 
> Whatever it was that helped h=
er then, rescued her would hear her now. She was being helped moreso by tec=
hnology. Her spark could call out. 
> 
> "someone... please... help." 
> Th=
e spark called out to it's rescuer.. or any bot that called itself Deceptic=
on.
